mhs.src.storage

Class DatabaseFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhs.src.storage.DatabaseFactory

  • public class DatabaseFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseFactory Singleton DatabaseFactory that controls creation of hot-single database object with set parameters Usage - Call getDatabaseFactory to setup factory settings with Database parameters - Use getDatabaseInstance to get DatabaseInstance
    Author:
    Timothy Lim Yi Wen A0087048X
